t: r/NanoGrowery on Reddit: Anybody on here have experience with Bloomspect brand lights?worth the money? Should I just get a ts 600/ts 1000?
s: September 15, 2021 - I would stick to a brand like Mars Hydro, Spider Farmer and others that have been tested rigerously. With that said, i dont have any experience with bloomspect so i cant say it it is good or not but i personally wouldnt waste my time with it.
